named-query.name: DocfaDatiGenerali.getDocfaDatiGeneraliByDocfa
named-query.query: SELECT ddg FROM DocfaDatiGenerali ddg WHERE ddg.protocolloReg = :protocollo AND ddg.fornitura = :fornitura

named-query.name: DocfaAnnotazioni.getAnnotazioniByDOCFA
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM DocfaAnnotazioni a WHERE a.id.protocolloReg = :protocollo AND a.id.fornitura = :fornitura ORDER BY a.id.progTrasc

named-query.name: DocfaDatiCensuari.getDatiCensuariByUiu_Docfa
named-query.query: SELECT d FROM DocfaDatiCensuari d WHERE d.id.protocolloRegistrazione = :protocollo AND d.id.fornitura = :fornitura AND d.foglio = lpad(:foglio,4,'0') AND d.numero = lpad(:particella,5,'0') AND d.subalterno = lpad(:unimm,4,'0') ORDER BY d.categoria, d.classe

named-query.name: DocfaDatiCensuari.getListaDatiCensuariByDOCFA
named-query.query: SELECT d FROM DocfaDatiCensuari d WHERE d.id.protocolloRegistrazione = :protocollo AND d.id.fornitura = :fornitura ORDER BY d.foglio, d.numero, d.subalterno

named-query.name: DocfaDatiCensuari.getDocfaDatiCensuariByFPS
named-query.query: SELECT d FROM DocfaDatiCensuari d WHERE d.foglio = lpad(:foglio,4,'0') AND d.numero = lpad(:particella,5,'0') AND d.subalterno = lpad(:subalterno,4,'0')

named-query.name: DocfaDatiCensuari.getDocfaDatiCensuariBySezFPS
named-query.query: SELECT d FROM DocfaDatiCensuari d WHERE d.sezione = :sezione AND d.foglio = lpad(:foglio,4,'0') AND d.numero = lpad(:particella,5,'0') AND d.subalterno = lpad(:subalterno,4,'0')

named-query.name: DocfaDichiaranti.getDichiaranti
named-query.query: SELECT d FROM DocfaDichiaranti d WHERE d.fornitura = :fornitura AND d.protocolloReg = :protocollo ORDER BY d.dicCognome, d.dicNome

named-query.name: DocfaDichiaranti.getSuggestionDichiarante
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT d.dicCognome, d.dicNome FROM DocfaDichiaranti d WHERE d.dicCognome ||' '||d.dicNome LIKE '%'||:denominazione||'%' ORDER BY d.dicCognome, d.dicNome

named-query.name: DocfaIntestati.getIntestati
named-query.query: SELECT d FROM DocfaIntestati d WHERE d.id.fornitura = :fornitura AND d.id.protocolloReg = :protocollo ORDER BY TRIM(d.cognome||d.nome||d.denominazione)

named-query.name: DocfaDatiMetrici.getDatiMetrici
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT dm FROM DocfaDatiCensuari dc, DocfaDatiMetrici dm WHERE dc.id.fornitura = TO_DATE (:fornitura, 'yyyyMMdd') AND dc.id.protocolloRegistrazione = :protocollo AND dc.id.dataRegistrazione = :data AND dc.foglio = LPAD(:foglio, 4, '0') AND dc.numero = LPAD(:particella, 5, '0') AND LPAD(NVL (dc.subalterno, '0'), 4, '0') = LPAD(NVL (:sub, '0'), 4, '0') AND dc.id.identificativoImmobile = dm.id.identificativoImmobile AND dc.id.fornitura = dm.fornitura AND dc.id.protocolloRegistrazione = dm.protocolloRegistrazione ORDER BY dm.ambiente

named-query.name: DocfaInParteUno.getListaParteUnoByDocfa
named-query.query: select d from DocfaInParteUno d where d.id.protocolloReg = :protocollo and d.id.fornitura = :fornitura order by d.id.nrProg

named-query.name: DocfaInParteDueH.getListaParteDueHByDocfa
named-query.query: select d from DocfaInParteDueH d where d.id.protocolloReg = :protocollo and d.id.fornitura = :fornitura order by d.id.nrProg

named-query.name: DocfaInParteDueH.getDatiMetriciABC
named-query.query: select d from DocfaInParteDueH d where (d.ctFoglio01 = LPAD(:foglio, 4, '0') and d.ctNumero01 = LPAD(:particella, 5, '0') and LPAD(NVL (d.ctSubalterno01, '0'), 4, '0') = LPAD(:sub, 4, '0') and d.id.protocolloReg = :protocollo and d.id.fornitura = :fornitura) or (d.ctFoglio02 = LPAD(:foglio, 4, '0') and d.ctNumero02 = LPAD(:particella, 5, '0') and LPAD(NVL (d.ctSubalterno02, '0'), 4, '0') = LPAD(:sub, 4, '0') and d.id.protocolloReg = :protocollo and d.id.fornitura = :fornitura) or (d.ctFoglio03 = LPAD(:foglio, 4, '0') and d.ctNumero03 = LPAD(:particella, 5, '0') and LPAD(NVL (d.ctSubalterno03, '0'), 4, '0') = LPAD(:sub, 4, '0') and d.id.protocolloReg = :protocollo and d.id.fornitura = :fornitura) or (d.ctFoglio04 = LPAD(:foglio, 4, '0') and d.ctNumero04 = LPAD(:particella, 5, '0') and LPAD(NVL (d.ctSubalterno04, '0'), 4, '0') = LPAD(:sub, 4, '0') and d.id.protocolloReg = :protocollo and d.id.fornitura = :fornitura)

named-query.name: DocfaPlanimetrie.getPlanimetrieDocfa
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT dp FROM DocfaDatiCensuari dc, DocfaPlanimetrie dp WHERE dc.id.fornitura = TO_DATE (:fornitura, 'yyyyMMdd') AND dp.fornitura = TO_DATE (:fornitura, 'yyyyMMdd') AND dc.id.protocolloRegistrazione = :protocollo AND dp.protocollo = :protocollo AND dc.id.dataRegistrazione = :data AND dp.dataRegistrazione = TO_DATE (:data, 'yyyyMMdd') AND dc.foglio = LPAD(:foglio, 4, '0') AND dc.numero = LPAD(:particella, 5, '0') AND LPAD(NVL (dc.subalterno, '0'), 4, '0') = LPAD(NVL (:sub, '0'), 4, '0') AND (dc.id.identificativoImmobile = dp.identificativoImmo OR dp.identificativoImmo = 0) ORDER BY dp.id.nomePlan, dp.id.progressivo

named-query.name: DocfaPlanimetrie.getPlanimetriePerDocfa
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT dp FROM DocfaDatiCensuari dc, DocfaPlanimetrie dp WHERE dc.id.fornitura = TO_DATE (:fornitura, 'yyyyMMdd') AND dp.fornitura = TO_DATE (:fornitura, 'yyyyMMdd') AND dc.id.protocolloRegistrazione = :protocollo AND dp.protocollo = :protocollo AND dc.foglio = LPAD(:foglio, 4, '0') AND dc.numero = LPAD(:particella, 5, '0') AND (dc.id.identificativoImmobile = dp.identificativoImmo OR dp.identificativoImmo = 0) ORDER BY dp.id.nomePlan, dp.id.progressivo

named-query.name: DocfaPlanimetrie.getPlanimetriePerSezFglNum
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT dp FROM DocfaDatiCensuari dc, DocfaPlanimetrie dp WHERE NVL(TRIM(dc.sezione),'-') = NVL(TRIM(:sezione),'-') AND dc.foglio = LPAD(:foglio, 4, '0') AND dc.numero = LPAD(:particella, 5, '0') AND (dc.id.identificativoImmobile = dp.identificativoImmo OR (dp.identificativoImmo = 0 and dc.id.protocolloRegistrazione = dp.protocollo and dc.id.fornitura = dp.fornitura) ) ORDER BY dp.id.nomePlan, dp.id.progressivo

named-query.name: DocfaUiu.getForniture
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT d.fornitura FROM DocfaUiu d ORDER BY d.fornitura

named-query.name: DocfaUiu.getVie
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT UPPER(d.indirToponimo) FROM DocfaUiu d WHERE UPPER(d.indirToponimo) LIKE '%'||:via||'%' ORDER BY UPPER(d.indirToponimo)

named-query.name: DocfaUiu.getCiviciByVia
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT d.indirNcivUno FROM DocfaUiu d WHERE UPPER(d.indirToponimo) = :via ORDER BY d.indirNcivUno

named-query.name: DocfaUiu.getListaDocfaUiuByDOCFA
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM DocfaUiu u WHERE u.id.protocolloReg = :protocollo AND u.id.fornitura = :fornitura ORDER BY u.foglio, u.numero, u.subalterno

named-query.name: DocfaUiu.getDocfaUiu
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM DocfaUiu u WHERE u.id.fornitura = TO_DATE (:fornitura, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AND u.id.protocolloReg = :protocollo AND u.foglio = LPAD(:foglio, 4, '0') AND u.numero = LPAD(:particella, 5, '0')

named-query.name: DocfaUiu.getDocfaUiuBySez
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM DocfaUiu u WHERE u.id.fornitura = TO_DATE (:fornitura, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AND u.id.protocolloReg = :protocollo AND (u.sezione is NULL OR u.sezione= :sezione) AND u.foglio = LPAD(:foglio, 4, '0') AND u.numero = LPAD(:particella, 5, '0')

named-query.name: DocfaUiu.getDocfaUiuByFabbricato_Docfa_Data
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM DocfaUiu u, DocfaDatiGenerali g WHERE g.protocolloReg = u.protocolloReg AND g.fornitura = u.fornitura AND u.id.fornitura = :fornitura AND u.id.protocolloReg = :protocollo AND (u.sezione is null or u.sezione=:sezione) AND u.foglio = LPAD(:foglio, 4, '0') AND u.numero = LPAD(:particella, 5, '0') AND (g.dataVariazione is null or g.dataVariazione <=:dataRif) order by u.sezione, u.foglio, u.numero, u.subalterno

named-query.name: DocfaUiu.getListaDocfaUiuByFPS
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM DocfaUiu u WHERE u.foglio = LPAD(:foglio, 4, '0') AND u.numero = LPAD(:particella, 5, '0') AND LPAD(NVL(TRIM(u.subalterno),'0'),4,'0') = LPAD(:subalterno, 4, '0')

named-query.name: DocfaUiu.getListaDocfaUiuBySezFPS
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM DocfaUiu u WHERE(u.sezione is NULL OR u.sezione= :sezione) AND u.foglio = LPAD(:foglio, 4, '0') AND u.numero = LPAD(:particella, 5, '0') AND LPAD(NVL(TRIM(u.subalterno),'0'),4,'0') = LPAD(:subalterno, 4, '0')

named-query.name: DocfaValori.getDocfaValoriByMicrozonaStatoCat
named-query.query: SELECT v FROM DocfaValori v WHERE TO_NUMBER(v.id.microzona) = :microzona AND v.id.tipologiaEdilizia = :tipologiaEdilizia AND v.id.stato = :flgNuovaCostruzione

named-query.name: DocfaValori.getDocfaValoriByZonaOmiStatoCat
named-query.query: SELECT v FROM DocfaValori v WHERE v.zona = :zonaOmi AND v.id.tipologiaEdilizia = :tipologiaEdilizia AND v.id.stato = :flgNuovaCostruzione

named-query.name: DocfaFogliMicrozona.getDatiZonaByFoglio
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT v FROM DocfaFogliMicrozona v WHERE TO_NUMBER(v.id.foglio) = TO_NUMBER(:foglio)

named-query.name: DocfaFogliMicrozona.getListaFogli
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT v.id.foglio FROM DocfaFogliMicrozona v ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(v.id.foglio)
